name: Auto Feature Generation
description: This script extends a given dataset with new features that comes from applying unsupervised models.

inputs.name: cluster-params
inputs.description: Params of the cluster model. Leave blank for default 1-Click cluster

inputs.name: anomaly-params
inputs.description: Params of the anomaly detector. Leave blank for default 1-Click anomaly detector

inputs.name: topic-params
inputs.description: Params of the topic model. Leave blank for default 1-Click topic model

inputs.name: pca-params
inputs.description: Params of the PCA model. Leave blank for default 1-Click PCA

outputs.name: extended-dataset
outputs.description: Dataset extended with the new generated features
